name: vr-match
description: A [re-frame](https://github.com/Day8/re-frame) application designed to ... well, that part is up to you.

scripts.build:dev: npm run build:dev:client && npm run build:dev:server
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:prod:client && npm run build:prod:server
scripts.build:prod:client: lein cljsbuild once prod && npm run workbox
scripts.build:prod:server: lein cljsbuild once server-prod && sed -i -e 's/goog.global.React/global.React/g' -e 's/goog.global.ReactDOM/global.ReactDOM/g' -e 's/goog.global.createReactClass/global.createReactClass/g' target/server/prod/js/compiled/server.js

author: hoge
